des:
There’s no need to go to the switch to adjust your device - just talk to Alexa on your Amazon Echo.

After connecting Alexa to your Home Comfort products in a few simple steps:
1.Download “Home Comfort” App and register an account
2.Configure some devices on “Home Comfort” App
3.Download Amazon "Alexa" app and configure Echo with "Alexa" app
4.Search "TCL Home Comfort" skill from the "Alexa" app skills category
5.Click Enable skill, and you will be navigated to login page
6.Input your “Home Comfort” App Account username and password, you'll be redirect to the success page
7.Now all setup is finished.

You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these:
Alexa, turn on the DEVICENAME.
Alexa, turn off the DEVICENAME.
Alexa, set the bedroom fan speed to <auto、high、medium、low>.
Alexa, set the fan speed on the bedroom fan to maximum.
Alexa, turn up the bedroom fan speed.
Alexa, decrease the fan speed on the bedroom fan by 3.
Alexa, what is the bedroom fan speed?
set <device name> to <16~31> degrees
set <device name> to <16~31>
decrease <device or group name>
increase <device or group name>
What's my <devicename> set to?
What's the temperature in here?
